SECTION.DESC: Several properties affect the appearance of the signature capture functionality. You can set their values before showing the capture interface:
SECTION.CODE: # Change fullscreen from true (default) to false Rho::Signature.fullScreen = false; # Change background color from white (default) to black Rho::Signature.bgColor = "#000000" # Change pen color from blue (default) to white Rho::Signature.penColor = "#FFFFFF"

SECTION.DESC: Properties can also be set from Javascript
